compliance_assessment.framework_description: Regulation governing data protection and privacy in the European Union, focusing on data subject rights, data breaches, and secure data handling.

requirements.requirement: Data encryption at rest and in transit for processing personal data.
requirements.evidence: Data Encryption at Rest/In Transit control is planned but not implemented.
gaps: Missing encryption protocols for sensitive data
recommendations: Implement AES-256 encryption for data at rest and TLS 1.3 for data in transit

requirements.requirement: Secure storage of credentials and sensitive data.
requirements.evidence: Encrypted Secure Storage control is planned but not implemented.
gaps: Plain text storage of credentials detected in configuration files
recommendations: Adopt encrypted config files or environment variables

requirements.requirement: Access controls to prevent unauthorized data processing.
requirements.evidence: Least Privilege Access Controls control is planned but not implemented.
gaps: CLI operations lack role-based access restrictions

critical_gaps: Unimplemented encryption controls for sensitive data
Lack of secure storage mechanisms for credentials
Missing access controls for data processing
remediation_plan: Prioritize implementation of Data Encryption at Rest/In Transit control
Deploy encrypted secure storage solutions for credentials
Enforce RBAC for CLI operations and configuration management
